features: [Technological breakthrough] the ability to launch up to 20 million negative ions per second, the purifier works 2 hours, rest 10 minutes, the release of negative ions more scientific.

[Small size, very practical] Don't let the mini size fool you. Capable of delivering up to 10 times as many negative ions to a 5x, 500 square foot area, take advantage of our advanced technology and take a relaxing breath.

[Easy to use and economical] Simply plug in and it works instantly, with a low-loss design that allows it to work all day (about 1 watt of power). This product prevents you from replacing expensive accessories (no need to replace the filter chip).
[Powerful purification function] Our air purifier has a fast and super purifying function that relieves congestion, is chemical-free and cleans the air. Helps keep the air fresh and clean.
[Applicable scenes] hallway, bedroom, bathroom, living room, stairs and other spaces. Let you enjoy a forest-like feeling anytime and anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic air fresheners
reviews.reviewText: These air fresheners have made such a difference in the quality of air in may efficiency apartment. I no longer have to contend with cooking, dirty laundry or outside odors that manage together into my apartment. They have made a Hugh difference in my quality of life. I noticed the difference in less than an hour. Wish I had known about these sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Clean air, less dust.
reviews.reviewText: Seems to work at keeping air clean but when burned food smoked, it didn't really work well. For bedroom the light and it's pulses are disturbing when trying to fall asleep.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I expected. The only thing I didn't realize is you cannot use in high humidity rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Quiet, but light flashes every few minutes. As far as reducing dust, I actually think it is working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Edited: where’s the Refund? No noticeable difference at all
reviews.reviewText: I tried one in the worst smelling room in the house my roommate’s room so unfortunately it does nothing at all. Not impressed and paid for new and I could tell it’s been used before I used one out of the 5 ordered. That’s 2 things I wasn’t impressed about. Lost interest in it and seller. That tells me not to buy from them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NOT SAFE FOR BIRDS
reviews.reviewText: It works well although it says safe for pets.. It is not safe for birds, the ionizer feature will potentially kill your birds.. Make sure not to put it anywhere near them.. I feel if it says safe for pets they should do the research and make sure that statement is accurate.. NOT SAFE FOR BIRDS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Can damage the wall?
reviews.reviewText: I had to return this. It did not say it in the product description before I bought it that it could damage the painted wall. The packaging stated to put some kind of clear glue or sticker on the wall where the item is plugged into because there could be damage to the paint. This is very perplexing to me to find out after the fact that this could happen. I am glad that I read the package warning first. I would suggest this item come with what they are suggesting to put on the wall to protect it from damage. Unfortunately the nice size and the price did not have me keeping it because of the other problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a dog who likes to play outside and I can't bathe him every day. So of course the house sometimes smells like "dog". I put 2 of these in my bedroom and the room had a neutral smell the very next day. I'll be ordering more!!
